name: O'Brien, Appellant, v. O'Brien Steel Construction Company et al.
name_abbreviation: O'Brien v. O'Brien Steel Construction Co.

parties: O’Brien, Appellant, v. O’Brien Steel Construction Company et al.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellant.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Frank C. Carroll, with him McJlvaine, Murphy, Carroll & Phillips, for appellant.

casebody.head_matter:
O’Brien, Appellant, v. O’Brien Steel Construction Company et al.
Argued March 19, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barbieri, JJ.
Frank C. Carroll, with him McJlvaine, Murphy, Carroll & Phillips, for appellant.
John T. O’Brien, appellee, in propria persona.
Sue O’Brien Miller, appellee, in propria persona.
Joseph M. O’Brien, appellee, in propria persona.
June 28, 1971:
